body.description: This lightweight gel moisturizer is cool-to-the touch and formulated to quench the thirst of any and all skin types. Loaded with Lycopene and Watermelon Extract to refresh, Vitamin C to brighten, and skin-plumping Sodium Hyaluronate to improve texture, this is your ticket to soft, supple, refreshed skin on the daily. Apply morning and night after cleansing and treatment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our Mission Yes To helps you make better skincare choices by providing clean and efficacious natural beauty solutions. Known for our fruit and veggie-based products that feature at least 95% natural ingredients (before water), our formulations are Leaping Bunny Certified, dermatologist tested and free of over 2,000 questionable ingredients, including those banned by the EU and Canada. Yes To is proud to offer intuitive skincare that’s inspired by nature and designed to deliver the quality you crave. Yes To Watermelon Daily Gel Moisturizer For All Skin Types Yes to a lightweight gel-texture moisturizer infused with watermelon to help cool and quench skin daily. This light pink, delicious smelling watermelon moisturizer is rich in lycopene and vitamin C to lightly hydrate and leave skin feeling refreshed and soft. 96% natural ingredients. Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones. Leaping Bunny Certified. Vegan.

Other Items to Consider from Yes To Watermelon Refreshing Facial Wipes Yes to making a clean sweep with a plant-based wipe infused with juicy and fresh watermelon to cleanse, lightly hydrate and remove makeup in one swipe! Formulated with watermelon extract, a lightweight, incredibly hydrating ingredient, and aloe vera a soothing ingredient that absorbs easily, this 40 count of wipes helps leave skin refreshed, brighter and smoother looking. Facial towellets are dermatologist tested. Watermelon Daily Facial Scrub When in doubt, just add water(melon). Give yourself the fresh start you and your gorgeous face deserve with our invigorating face scrub. Gently melt away makeup, unclog stubborn pores and lightly hydrate for smoother, radiant-looking skin. This refreshing, gel-textured formula does it all without stripping your skin of the moisture it needs to thrive just like you. Avocado Daily Eye Cream Smooths skin in the blink of an eye. Packed with eye-opening ingredients that hydrate the delicate skin under your eyes, this richly textured cream makes dull, sunken skin feel as soft and supple as it did before you cared about soft and supple skin. After 4 weeks of use, over 90% of users felt the eye cream left the under-eye area feeling moisturized, nourished and soothed and over 90% of users felt the eye cream left the under-eye area visibly less dry and improved skin hydration in the under-eye area.

Watermelon Refreshing Facial Wipes Watermelon Daily Facial Scrub Watermelon Daily Gel Cleanser Watermelon Refreshing Jelly Mask Watermelon Daily Gel Moisturizer Watermelon Daily Hand Cream, 3 Oz 2pk Regimen Step WIPE SCRUB CLEANSE MASK MOISTURIZE HAND TREATMENT What it does Pre-moistened wipes to cleanse face Exfoliates to help unclog pores Dissolves and breaks down impurities Helps soften & lightly hydrate skin Helps cool & quench skin daily Revitalizes hands & cuticles % Natural 97% 95% 96% 96% 96% 95% Key Ingredients Watermelon + Aloe Vera + Vitamin C Watermelon + Lycopene + Vitamin C Watermelon + Aloe Vera + Vitamin C Watermelon + Aloe Vera + Vitamin C Watermelon + Lycopene + Vitamin C Watermelon + Shea Butter + Aloe Vera + Vitamin C Formula Claims "Vegan Dermatologist Tested Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones Cruelty-free" "Vegan Dermatologist Tested Non-comedogenic Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones Cruelty-free" "Vegan Dermatologist Tested Non-comedogenic Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones Cruelty-free" "Vegan Dermatologist Tested Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones Cruelty-free" "Vegan Dermatologist Tested Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones Cruelty-free" "Vegan Dermatologist Tested Formulated without Parabens, SLS and Silicones Cruelty-free" Skin Type All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types All skin types Feature Plant-based fibers Gentle for morning & night Gel texture transforms into a lather Translucent pink mask Lightweight hydrating gel formula No greasy or tacky residue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wasn't expecting much. . .
reviews.reviewText: . . .and I was really wrong. This moisturizer is wonderful. It has a thick texture that absorbs quickly into my skin, leaving it soft and hydrated. I only use cruelty free, vegan products so it's a real find for me, especially at the price it's being offered. Great stuff. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A great moisturizer that smells amazing! My skin drinks it right up and it makes my skin so soft!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Ingredients - Wish this was Unscented
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a less expensive dupe for the Clinique Moisture Surge which is sometimes the only thing I can use on my face when it’s really sensitive (recently found out I have rosacea, which explains a lot). This product is *super affordable* and has a fantastic ingredients list, plus it does not irritate my skin despite being fragranced.There are a lot of extracts that are beneficial but also be on the lookout if you have any allergies: watermelon, tomato, apricot kernel oil, red seaweed, ivy gourd (related to bitter melon), neem (fantastic for clearing and healing skin), eggplant, aloe, holy basil and turmeric. Sodium hyaluronate is the second ingredient, plus glycerin, and a Vitamin C derivative Aminopropyl Ascorbyl Phosphate. The Amazon ingredients say something about soy beans and retinol (which would be weird for a daytime product like this), so it sounds like they need to be updated.Anyway, that’s a pretty amazing line up for something that is normally less than $10 (I got it for FOUR DOLLARS on sale!). It does take a little longer to absorb and sometimes feel a little sticky/tacky because it’s lacking some of the other ingredients that would make it absorb faster which some may find objectionable like volatile silicons or simple/denatured alcohols. However, some people may appreciate that as a base for makeup or not mind an extra five minutes to absorb if they have a silicon or alcohol sensitivity. I do wish that they had not added artificial fragrance since there are already enough extracts going on here to probably give it some kind of natural herby scent, but I’m guessing they are trying for something akin to the Glow Recipe stuff that seems to be popular (haven’t tried it personally). The scent doesn’t linger terribly long (less than 5 minutes while it is absorbing), but I’m just not super into smells so this is a little annoying for me. However, considering the price and the lineup of ingredients, I’ll deal with five minutes of watermelon candy face. Will repurchase for sure when my current jar runs out. Which might be soon since I feel like I can liberally slather this all over my face and neck whenever I want since I didn’t pay $50 for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Acne? Just say Yes, Yes, Yes, to clearer skin
reviews.reviewText: I took antibiotics for approximately fifteen years, underwent chemical peels, light therapy, hormonal therapies, dermabrasion, and finally it was Accutane that cleared my skin for many years. I was in heaven. Then out of nowhere, when I leapt to the other side of mid-life, I started having occasional bumps again. Anything would cause a flare-up, even applying sunscreen was sure to clog pores causing a Godzilla eruption. Although I have been very upset to revisit the past through acne, I was surprised to read, recently, that 40% of women who have never had acne are now experiencing it at mid-life and beyond --- well into their sixties. I don't know what's up with that, but I feel for all my sister friends who are in the same boat.I've tried every single skin care product available, spending thousands of dollars. The only thing that helped some was 'Clean & Clear OIL-FREE' moisturizer. But this contains Salicylic Acid and repeated use was making my aging skin look dry, somewhat lathery, and VERY sensitive to the sun.On a lark, I decided to order 'Yes To Tomatoes' for clear skin. I have given it a good therapeutic trial before offering an endorsement. I have just finished my first bottle and have my next on order. I'm amazed that this moderately priced product has performed so well. My skin is dewey, the fine lines are diminishing, and even the deeper ones are showing improvement. I've even been getting some complements on my complexion --- for the first time, ever. But, the most important factor is: I have only had one bump, early in the trial; it cleared up promptly, when using the 'Yes Spot Stick' at bedtime (which I highly recommend, too).On days when I have worn more makeup than usual, or I've been exercising, or working in the garden, I will use the 'Yes Deep Cleansing Pads'. Love them! They are salicylic acid pads, but for some reason when I use this product, it makes my face feel soft and clean, unlike the Clean & Clear.I love that these products are Paraben-free and 98% natural. I often wonder how much my skin was previously reacting to chemicals that it just couldn't tolerate.The only negative for me was the smell which is a little strong. It took me a little time to adjust to it, but it does dissipate quickly and I hardly notice it now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heavenly. This stuff is perfect for me. It's soothing, smells great and and doesn't put a layer of oil on my already oily face. I don't feel the need to use some kind of oil or creamy moisturizer on top of this because it seems to seal in the moisture all by itself. I want to briefly mention that I do experience mild and temporary redness when I use this. It subsides quickly and I usually react this way with most products, even the most gentle so I'm not sure how much the redness pertains to this product specifically. For now, I'm absolutely going to keep using this but I'll update this review if I encounter any issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I hear this was a Dupe for the watermelon drops by another big name brand and well, being a mom on a budget but wanting to be healthy i gave it a good. love the gel, its lightweight and for oily skin. however, this moisturizer makes me break out. the packing is good, smell is good, like i siad lightweight helps maintain hydrated but for me it made me break out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Oily; Can Be Used Each Day & Night
reviews.reviewText: I also like that this cream is lightweight while imparting adequate moisture, it absorbs into the skin quickly, and the grapefruit fragrance is not strong. The scent is not sweet.
Questa è la miglior crema giorno che esista, l'inci é pieno di ingredienti top: acido ialuronico al primo posto in cui sono immerse vitamine e sieri RIMETTETELA SU AMAZON 🙏🙏

reviews.reviewTitle: Super, aber für meine Haut nicht geeignet
reviews.reviewText: Ich find sie grandios, Hautgefühl top,versorgt die Haut den ganzen Tag mit Feuchtigkeit. Ich finde sie nicht zu klebrig, versteh schon warum man sie als klebrig bezeichnet aber find es nicht tragisch. Funktioniert bei mir auch gut mit Sonnenschutz und Make up darüber ohne sich in Röllchen von meiner Haut zu verabschieden. Leider aber ist Sojaöl (Komedogenität 2-3) enthalten und ich denke meine zu starker Akne neigende Haut verträgt das nicht. Ich bekomme sogar da Unreinheiten wo ich eigentlich gar keine habe. Verwende sie jetzt nur noch für die Augenpartie. Bei empfindlicher Haut würde ich das nicht empfehlen ohne es zuerst im Patch Test Verfahren auszuprobieren. Und nachdem auch Retinol drinnen ist vergesst den Sonnenschutz nicht.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Smells great! Skin is left feeling smooth and fresh!
reviews.reviewText: Items arrived in the post quickly, tried all out today which consists of cucumber wipes which are nice and soft but couldn't smell the cucumber unfortunately! But they did manage to clean my face well, then I used the grapefruit exfoliating pads which worked well and smelt nice, they did nip my face a bit and made it go red but after I applied the watermelon moisturiser gel it all calmed down and my skin feels smooth to the touch and feeling refreshed also. Happy customer and would recommend others to try the products out too!
Bad experience fo me, I broke out severely, may b ma skin too oily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love it! I was sad to see that the packaging had apparently changed from the really cute packaging to something plainer but looks like I got an 'old' one!The moisturiser itself - it smells very lightly of 'fake' melon but mixed with a really natural fresh melon smell! Yummy! The smell fades pretty quickly.I was a bit worried by reviews mentioning burning but although I've got weird, fussy, sensitive skin, I haven't had that.Moisturiser has a pinky clear appearance and consistency, spreads well, non sticky, feels refreshing and cooling - prefect for Summer!I used to use the Yes to Cucumbers one which I also loved but it seems ridiculously expensive more.Impressed with this range.
